document_data.name: ''Knave's Robe''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Knave's robes''''' were common enchanted [[robe]]s worn by many [[wizard]]s across [[Faerûn]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Knave's robes'' were defensive robes often used by shady wizards and [[thieves]] who dabbled in the Art. The robes' enchantments shielded the wearer from [[poison]]s, [[blade]]s, and death spells.
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Elan Garaq]]: a [[rakshasa]] trader and [[Baeloth Barrityl]]'s right-hand from the [[Black Pits]] of [[Underdark]].
*[[Yago]]: a wizard from [[Baldur's Gate]] in the mid−14{{th}} century DR.
*[[Zordral]]: a witch hunter wizard from [[Nashkel]]'s carnival in [[1368 DR]].
